creacount: Create new account today to reap the benefits of a personalized shopping experience.
privacywarn: Your personal data will be used to support your experience throughout this website, to manage your account, and for other purposes described in our
Pwdvalid: Password must be at least 8 characters including at least 1 upper case letter, 1 lower case letter and 1 special character(!@#$%^&*~`)
InstructionDetails:
Madearn is decentralized,so we never escrow your items.
As a result, you need to sign for your listing and orders
Note that you can always change the price of your listing for free, without making a transaction or paying gas. You can view all your items here.
welcome_to_madearn: Welcome to MadEarn.com, the revolutionary blockchain-based eCommerce platform that's transforming the way you shop, earn, and experience the world of online retail. By leveraging the power of blockchain technology, MadEarn is redefining the eCommerce landscape with a secure, transparent, and efficient marketplace that offers an unparalleled shopping experience for both buyers and sellers.
at_madearn: At MadEarn, we combine the best of traditional online shopping with the cutting-edge advantages of blockchain technology. Our extensive catalog of products spans across various categories, including electronics, fashion, home goods, and more, catering to the diverse needs of our global user base.
as_a_platform: As a customer-centric platform, we prioritize security and trust. Our decentralized nature ensures that every transaction is secure, transparent, and tamper-proof, while our user-friendly interface simplifies the shopping experience for users of all skill levels.
our_innovation: MadEarn's innovative token economy fosters a vibrant ecosystem that rewards both buyers and sellers. Shoppers can earn token rewords through purchases, referrals, and participation in various promotions, while sellers benefit from reduced fees (as little as 1 cent), increased exposure, and seamless access to a global market.
our_platform: Our platform also supports the integration of cryptocurrencies, providing users with the flexibility to choose their preferred mode of payment. This feature, along with our commitment to creating a seamless and hassle-free shopping experience, makes MadEarn a trailblazer in the eCommerce industry.
join_us: Join the MadEarn community today and experience the future of online shopping. Discover a world of endless possibilities, where you can buy, sell, and earn in a secure, transparent, and decentralized environment. Embrace the new era of eCommerce with MadEarn.com, and let the shopping revolution begin!
Copyright: PAY.COOL Group Corp All Rights Reserved

MnemNote: Please accurately record and securely store the following twelve word mnemonic SEED, do not disclose the mnemonic SEED to anybody else. Disclosure of your mnemonic SEED will result in your account being compromised and you will lose all of your funds. Safely store your mnemonic SEED such that the loss or damage of a device does not impact your ability to access your mnemonic SEED. It is recommended to never send your mnemonic SEED via email or other social communication application. Be sure to only use your mnemonic SEED with the official eXchangily wallet.
